title: Uwork
subtitle: Graphic Design, UI/UX Design & Web Development
description: I developed Uwork, a mobile app at La Capsule Bootcamp. It connects jobseekers with companies, simplifying and democratizing the hiring process. Uwork revolutionizes traditional hiring, making it user-friendly and accessible. This project showcases my expertise in mobile app development and UX design.

title: Decathlon #1
subtitle: Web Development
description: As part of the Decathlon recruitment process, I completed a web development exercise to demonstrate my abilities and qualify for the front-end developers team. The task involved replicating a Figma web page from scratch, showcasing my proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I focused on attention to detail, responsiveness, and clean code, aiming to deliver a seamless user experience.

title: Decathlon #2
subtitle: Web Development
description: In the second Decathlon exercise, I recreated a Figma design while adding features like a search bar, pagination (12 sports per page), and the option to filter Decathlon represented sports. I prioritized a seamless user experience and followed coding best practices. This exercise showcased my ability to enhance functionality in web design.
